snippet: A solar panel installer, SolarCity, filed with regulators to raise up to $201 million in an initial public offering that could help rekindle investor appetite for clean tech stocks.
abstract: Solar panel installer SolarCity files with regulators to raise up to $201 million in an initial public offering that could help rekindle investor appetite for clean tech stocks.
lead_paragraph: A solar panel installer, SolarCity, filed with regulators to raise up to $201 million in an initial public offering that could help rekindle investor appetite for clean tech stocks.

headline.main: Solar Panel Company Plans a Stock Offering
